game.name: Dogs Organized Neatly
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 이 2D 퍼즐 게임에서는 그리드에 맞는 방식으로 사랑스러운 멍멍이를 배열해야 합니다. Dogs Organized Neatly에는 80가지 다른 핸드크래프트 레벨과 다양한 모양과 크기의 멍멍이가 포함되어 있습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In this 2D puzzle game you have the responsibility to arrange lovely doggos in a way that fits the grid. Dogs Organized Neatly comes with 80 brand-new hand-crafted levels and a whole bunch of dogs in all shapes and sizes.

reviewHighlights.text: Look, sometimes it's just nice to hang out with dogs. If those can't be real dogs, then maybe, just maybe, happy 2D renders of dogs will have to do. D...
Tetris with dogs! I love a puzzle game that is straight to the point and has a level of growing complexity. Loved that they made one to match "Cats Or...
